Reviews.Title: “No frills, but very convenient”
Reviews.Author: 121star
Reviews.Content: booked hotel special rate stay 2 nights 3rd night free five hotels immediate wasnt expecting fancy close 10 freeway incredibly convenient navigating ballparks phoenix glendale fitness center bare bones 1 treadmills 1 elliptical 1 bike pool continental breakfast definite plus employees interacted nice helpful clean met definitely stay spring training trip

Reviews.Title: “Nicely appointed rooms”
Reviews.Author: stsimmer
Reviews.Content: average price chain top line found nicely outfitted comfortable beds premium quality sheets microwave fridge flatscreen tv clean front desk friendly clientele sports fans baseball spring training dislike people breakfast bar pajamas cant pull pair jeans anyway nights sleep enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly, close to where the Brew Crew play”
Reviews.Author: erin h
Reviews.Content: clean hotel staff front desk friendly clean king bed sooooo comfortable close brewers play plus loved maids werent banging door 8 am clean breakfast located i17 i10 staying

Reviews.Title: “Getaway”
Reviews.Author: Jeff G
Reviews.Content: quick getaway midwest cold hotel located interstate quiet staff attentive spacious suite perfect return day fun sun taking activities price value ammenities added complementary breakfast heated outdoor pool jacuzzi

Reviews.Title: “Maintainance is awful!”

Reviews.Content: comfortable dont arent ice machines operates jets hot tub clogged security door unlocked main light switch bedside lights entrance light dresser decoration drawers false business center computer lacks printer breakfast isnt bad eggs obviously powdered housekeeping missed day

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL - with many amenities that most other hotels nickel & dime you for.”
Reviews.Author: ajmitchell
Reviews.Content: usually stay hotels stars name trip close meetings options hotel completely exceeded expectations starting lobby staff extremely gracious fresh brewed coffee day complimentary continental breakfast provided morning nice variety options king comfortable bed pillows duvet nice seating spacious internet provided charge coffee machine microwave fridge included shop misc items fridge heat facility looked fresh paint housekeeping staff fantastic job days expensive hotels charge individually possibly imagine ridiculous i10 west hotel paid 100 night money
